com.qubecell.elogger
Class ELogger

java.lang.Object
  com.qubecell.elogger.ELogger

public class ELogger
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the API for saving the log on sdcard and also display the log in logcat.

Author:
Vikram

Method Detail

init

public static boolean init(java.lang.String logFileName)
This is static method, for initializing for variable of ELogger. This method takes file name as argument. If file name is passed then this class saves the log message in given file name on device SDCARD. If file name not provided then this class print the log only in logcat.

Parameters:
logFileName -
Returns:
return's true if ELogger successfully initialized otherwise false

backUpLog

private static boolean backUpLog()
This method takes the backup of log file if the log file size is greater than 100MB

Returns:
true if backup taken otherwise false

saveLogToFile

private void saveLogToFile(java.lang.String msg)
This method saves the log message into specified file name. It takes message as parameter

Parameters:
message - to be saved

setLogLevel

public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
This method is used to set the log levels.

Parameters:
logLevel -
